title: Rise N' Grind
description: Come join us as we equip you with tools for professional development. We'll be sharing tips about attaining internships, using Handshake for jobs, practice elevator pitches and even get your professional headshot taken. Ready to GRIND?

title: Flop Era to Glow Up: Turning Failure into Fuel
description: Failure happens, and that's okay! This LEAD Series workshop creates space to reflect on setbacks without shame, reframe what it means to "fail," and learn how to bounce back stronger. Through honest conversations and practical strategies, you'll explore how to grow from challenges and build resilience.

title: Special Announcement Event
description: Details to be announced - stay tuned!

title: Say It With Your Chest: Speaking Up & Standing Strong
description: Finding your voice and speaking up can be challenging, but it is key to advocating for yourself and others. You'll learn practical communication skills and ways to overcome fear or hesitation so you can say what matters with confidence.

title: Lunch & Learn: Wangari Maathai (2004)
description: Kenyan environmentalist and political activist who founded the Green Belt Movement and was the first African woman to win the Nobel Peace Prize.

title: Lunch & Learn: Dolores Huerta
description: American labor leader and civil rights activist who co-founded the United Farm Workers.

title: End the Beef: How to Disagree Without Disrespect
description: This LEAD Series workshop teaches you how to manage disagreements respectfully. You'll build emotional intelligence and active listening skills to turn conflict into positive collaboration.

title: Lunch & Learn: Martin Luther King
description: Civil rights leader and advocate for nonviolent resistance, known for his role in the American civil rights movement.

title: Main Character Energy: A Workshop on Self-Love
description: This LEAD Series workshop is all about stepping into your main character energy by embracing self-love and self-care. You'll explore ways to build confidence, set boundaries, and nurture a positive relationship with yourself.

title: Lunch & Learn: Desmond Tutu (1984)
description: South African Anglican bishop and human rights activist who was a key figure in the fight against apartheid.
